name: TETRAHYFROFURAN – THF (CAS 109-99-9)
description: easy availability for industrial use
water white / colourless, low viscosity
material meeting customer need can be arranged
the compound is classified as heterocyclic compound
as a monomer in the production of polytetramethylene ether glycol (ptmeg)
as a solvent in polyvinyl chloride (pvc) cements, coatings, in precision magnetic tape manufacture and as a reaction solvent
versatile solvent with numerous applications in areas such as adhesives, vinyl films and cellophanes, industrial resins, elastomers, coatings and printing inks
function as a pvc-type cleaner before joint formation

used in consumer products as a component of cleaning fluids, paint removers and stripping fluids, functional fluids, lacquers and coatings, adhesives, and as functional fluids and corrosion inhibitors

manufacture of industrial resins, polyurethane coatings, elastomers and printing inks pvc cleaner prior to jointing rigid pipes in compounded cements for leather, plastic sheet film extrusions film formation for vinyl top coating, cast vinyl films, coated cellophane etc
as a pharmaceutical solvent
solvent for anionic polymerization

practically clourless and odourless
